page.title: 10 A Sunday At Home.
page.content: In the morning we get up and have our breakfast.After eating mum cleans up and goes to work at Kings School.Then my brother goes to work at the farm. When mum comes home she starts cooking our roast,which consists of lamb,roast potatoes,boiled potatoes,yorkshire pudding,peas and carrots.For afters we have rhubarb tart. At about 12:30pm dad and I go to the pub and return at 1:15pm ready for our dinner.We eat our dinner and after that we sit down and watch television. Later on mum goes out and does a bit of gardening,while dad falls asleep.At 5:30pm we have our tea and after that we sit down and watch television until 9:30pm when I go to bed. At 11:30pm mum and dad go to bed,but my brother stays at the farm.
